items.title: Europe using VR abuse to prepare for Ryder Cup
items.summary: Europe Ryder Cup captain Luke Donald sanctions the use of VR headsets playing abusive messages to prepare his players for the "bear pit" of Bethpage against the US.

items.title: How 'phoenix' Seville ushered in new era for Jamaican sprinting

items.title: Late goal earns Fulham first league win of the season

items.title: Everton miss big chances in draw with Aston Villa
